```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
crimes = read.csv('crimes_data_2019.csv')
crimes <- crimes[order(crimes$date_x), ]
```

```{r}
crimes$location_x = gsub("[()]", "", crimes$location_x)
crimes = separate(data = crimes, col = location_x, into = c("x_coord", "y_coord"), sep = "\\,")
crimes$x_coord = as.numeric(crimes$x_coord)
crimes = drop_na(crimes)
```


```{r}
ggplot(crimes,aes(x = primary_type_x))+
  geom_bar()+
  facet_wrap(~ location_description_x)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```

```{r}
crimes$Month = month.name[crimes$Month]
all(crimes$Month %in% month.name)
crimes$Month <- factor(crimes$Month, levels=month.name)
```


```{r}
ggplot(crimes,aes(x = Month))+
  geom_bar()+
  facet_wrap(~location_description_x)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```
```{r}
ggplot(crimes,aes(x = Month))+
  geom_bar(alpha = 0.8)+
  facet_wrap(~ primary_type_x)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```

```{r}
ggplot(crimes,aes(x = arrest_x))+
  geom_histogram()
```
